page.title: 13HOUSING AND BUILDINGS 2
page.content: or so, have been sold separately for conversion into luxury dwellings. One such former farmhouse (Crossnapend) dating from the 17th century, now converted into a country house with 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 reception rooms, is currently up for sale at Â£120,000. Barn conversions, another recent development, are quite common, providing expensive,rural seclusion for professional people.At Lower Core Farm is the biggest stone_built barn in Lancashire and in the fields of the farm are two craters where a plane, passing overhead during World War ll, unloaded bombs.
